sect1.title: Accessing the Program
sect1.para:
Gpe-Button-Config is accessable from the settings folder in the keys and buttons application under the Buttons Tab.
GPE Settings Folder
Main Application Screen

sect1.title: Using the Application
sect1.para:
Here you can change the function of your buttons:
Tap on the corresponding button for your device. You can then:
Select the desired option from the drop down list.
Type in your own custom command.
Open an application to run.
Drop Down List
Opening an Application
Important Note
Functionality and layout will vary from device to device.
